questions.prompt: A series of works by Young British Artist Damien Hirst features animals—including a tiger shark, sheep, cows, and a unicorn—submerged in a tank of what fluid?
This photo demonstrates an example of one unit of what official measurement? Unofficial measurements use this term preceded by face, sheldon, country, and kitchen, among others.

Name the gritty and complex superhero film noir from 2009 that involves a costumed crimefighting team, coming out of retirement to confront a global conspiracy, during an alternate history version of the Cold War 1980s.

The French Revolutionary coup d'état known as the Thermidorian Reaction led directly to the execution of Maximilien Robespierre and, the following year (1795), the ultimate disestablishment of a political body first set up by the National Convention in April 1793? What was the name of this political body and de facto executive government?
questions.answer: committee of public safety (comité de salut public)

questions.prompt: Identify the artist in this clip. (18 seconds)
What ingredient is shared by the standard recipes for a Black Velvet, Boilermaker, Flaming Dr Pepper, Shandy, and Snakebite?
